programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 School of Rock
programme.desc: A singer in custody performs for the officers. A woman is charged with burglary, and officers see right through a young woman's tears.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E27 Just Browsing
programme.desc: Officers are called to a burglary at a warehouse housing expensive items. Police are called to the scene of a threatening man with a knife. Officers thwart an attempted suicide during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E12 Blood and Scars, Bro!
programme.desc: A suspect races through the neighborhood after his scooter can’t outrun police. Cops discover a drugged, incoherent wild man lying in the bushes. Officers try to make peace between neighbors with pit bull problems.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E07 Boat Guy
programme.desc: Officers engage in a high-speed chase with a motorcyclist. A man becomes verbally abusive with a woman and her mother after a boating trip. Police seize a rifle and 20 rounds of ammo from a man.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E10 Pickup Pullover
programme.desc: A man is arrested for stealing a large amount of copper wire from a business owner. A bicyclist is charged with possession and public intoxication. A man is pulled over for expired tags.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E04 There Goes that Alligator
programme.desc: Police arrest a suspect for armed robbery. A six foot alligator is found on a homeowner's back porch. An Officer assists in an undercover sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E10 Table for Two
programme.desc: Police respond to an emergency call and find a man in dire trouble. Deputies respond to an abusive husband at a local eatery. Two women try to buy narcotics from an undercover deputy during a sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E07 Allergy Season
programme.desc: A drunk driver rams into a pursuing police car. A man on a bike flees an area known for drug activity on a bike. A sniffling man attempts to hide a baggie with narcotics under his shirt.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E12 Above the Law
programme.desc: A foot chase gets complicated when the suspect proves he’s not in good health. A suspect believes he doesn’t need to follow the rules of the road. A man calls the police on his ex-girlfriend when she makes a moving mistake.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E07 No Shirt, Lots of Service
programme.desc: When approached by police, a suspect decides to take his shirt off and taunt the officers. Twin sisters ask for help when their third sister is threated by her boyfriend. An intoxicated suspect crashes his wife’s car into a light pole.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E09 Love Bites
programme.desc: A transgender woman in a wheelchair opens a can of whoop ass on an aggressive bully. Officers find a barely dressed couple in the midst of a biting match. A reckless driver doesn’t take too kindly to being pulled over.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E24 Not My Crack
programme.desc: An uncooperative suspect obeys instructions from his more levelheaded relative. A dead ringer for “The Rock” uncovers some crack rock. Officers try to get the truth out of two known drug users.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E27 Messy Situation
programme.desc: Officers coordinate a prostitution sting in a neighborhood. Officers pull over a vehicle with a missing license plate. Officers stop a woman driving a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E16 Where There’s Smoke
programme.desc: Officers engage in a high-speed pursuit of a stolen vehicle. Police spot a motel fire, alert the guests and contact the Fire Department. Officers pursue a suspect on a stolen motorcycle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E27 Unlucky Strikes
programme.desc: Witnesses of a car burglary assist an officer in locating the suspect. An officer investigates a fight involving a young man and a homeless gentleman. A suspect’s testimony is debunked after an eyewitness confirms that his knife wounds were self-inflicted.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E35 Crooked as a Fish Hook
programme.desc: A reverse drug operation proves successful for officers in both Tampa, FL and Palm Beach County, FL. Officers are in search of a suspect responsible for burglary.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E22 Petrol Heist
programme.desc: Officers wrestle an uncooperative driver to the ground after a traffic stop. Deputies search for a man who sent threatening texts to his ex-girlfriend. Two suspects are caught stealing gas.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E11 Pay the Price
programme.desc: Officers make an arrest in connection to an armed robbery with the help of the K-9 unit. Officers respond to a disturbance call at a local restaurant involving the manager and an inebriated patron. An officer pulls over a vehicle which later turns out to be littered with drug paraphernalia.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E05 Kiss & Make Up
programme.desc: Officers question a couple looking to score. Officers respond to a domestic violence call in which it is unclear what exactly transpired. Officers assist on a shots fired call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E09 Pretty White Lies
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E16 Amnesia Can Happen
programme.desc: Police officers set up a sting operation using a taxi cab in to bust prostitution. A man claims he can’t remember his ‘girlfriend’s’ name when officers suspect the woman is actually a stranger. Female undercover officers set up a sting operation to bust johns.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E12 You’ll Shoot Your Eye Out
programme.desc: A suspect runs through a hotel fence and then gives an employee some shocking news. Officers come upon two brothers who have just been in a knife fight. Cops arrive after an unruly man fires his BB gun at a neighbor’s child.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E05 Tuck and Roll, Hold On!
programme.desc: A stolen vehicle investigation results in a brief foot chase and subsequent arrest. A driver is pulled over and is arrested for the possession of a controlled substance. While on patrol an officer spots an distressed man inside a vehicle with busted windows.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E35 My BFF Screwed Up
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a woman holding a loaded gun to her head. Officers kick in a door to halt an assault in progress. A woman driving a stolen vehicle claims it was purchased by a friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E36 Visiting Hours Twofer
programme.desc: Police respond to a report of prostitution in a hospital parking lot. A man and woman engaged in solicitation are pulled over. A woman loitering in an area known for prostitution tries to evade police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E03 Who's Girlfriend?
programme.desc: A disastrous carjacking results in an arrest. Officers respond to a domestic abuse call involving two women. Officers find drug paraphernalia on a suspicious man parked in the middle of the street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E31 Dog Eat Dog
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect on a bike. The passenger of a vehicle is arrested for possession. Police are given a classic "I'm holding it for a friend" excuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E02 Read the Signs
programme.desc: Police follow a car after it leaves a drug house. A police officer in Las Vegas goes undercover posing as a ‘john.’ Officers give chase when they observe a car making an illegal U-Turn.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E05 Set Some Boundaries
programme.desc: A couple gets into a fight with their in-laws when they attempt to take their baby on a 3am drive. Two suspects proclaim their innocence after walking away from a hit and run. A man is attacked by his roommate after he gets ‘too friendly’ with a woman in their home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E03 Dangerous Toppings
programme.desc: A jaywalker with no ID bolts away from an officer. A man mixes illicit items with his pizza. A woman involved in a domestic violence call blames her monthly issues.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E19 Memory Loss
programme.desc: A man on parole dumps a stolen car and flees from officers on foot. A man denies stealing a wallet from a car with a smashed window. A hostile woman gives officers a false name.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E17 Backseat Denial
programme.desc: An officer struggles with a man reaching for something in his pocket. A man won’t cop to the gun in his backseat. Police arrive on the scene when a man threatens to shoot his wife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E07 Fire in the Hole
programme.desc: Officers make an arrest in connection to a string of robberies and recover discarded drugs and a gun in the process. An officer responds to a domestic dispute involving an intoxicated and hostile female. An officer checks in with a suspicious group of men in a high crime area.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E33 A Man's Pride
programme.desc: An officer assists with a burglary call at a mall jeweler. An officer responds to a domestic dispute call involving two newlyweds at a Las Vegas motel. An accident occurs during a routine traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E11 A Song of Fire and Cleaning
programme.desc: The pursuit of a criminal driver ends in a fire and police rescue. Police track down an elusive suspect. A family dispute over cleaning a garage ends with the police being called.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E02 Who Let the Dogs Out
programme.desc: Officers deploy a police K-9 when a burglary suspect takes refuge in a lemon tree. A suspect on the run seeks shelter in a stranger’s house. A biker with a suspended license just doesn’t know how to listen.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E10 Hot Potato
programme.desc: A man tosses his stash after being pulled over. Officers question two men in a fight who live with the same woman. A man says his shorts are from a thrift store after drugs are found in them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E16 Doggie Dispute
programme.desc: Deputies pursue a man wanted in connection with a family violence call. Detectives are called to a dispute between neighbors over an unleashed dog. Officers stop a suspect and find paperwork containing dozens of others Social Security numbers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E25 Taking Flight
programme.desc: A desperate driver is captured by officers after trying to flee on foot. Officers investigate a complaint regarding several intoxicated men soliciting themselves.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E33 Skipping Rocks
programme.desc: A man who ran from police complains that he was not read his rights. Officers detain kids who threw rocks at windowfronts. A paranoid man claims he is being chased by drug dealers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E07 Chainsaw Man
programme.desc: Detectives find a loaded gun while searching a vehicle. Local residents complain about a loud neighbor. A man is spotted walking down a road with a saw.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E32 Thrifting and Shoplifting
programme.desc: A vehicle is caught traveling in the opposite direction. A sting operation is designed to nab suspects who purchase narcotics. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local thrift store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E23 Donut Pursuit
programme.desc: Officers pursue a truck after a donut shop robbery. Deputies are dispatched when a wife attacks her husband with an unknown object. Deputies respond to a mother and son knife fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E05 Wardrobe Clash
programme.desc: A homeless man hides from deputies in the closet of an empty house. Officers called to a shooting find a man covered in blood. Deputies arrive to a domestic disturbance to find two brothers fighting over a pair of sandals.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E09 Poor Conflict Resolution
programme.desc: A suspect in a traffic stop decides to handle the situation by screaming at the police. Officers have a close encounter with a suspect who admits that he has hidden contraband. A man’s clothing choices tip police off to possible criminal behavior.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E26 Walk the Line
programme.desc: A DUI suspect with a suspended license claims he’s not drunk. Officers track an armed robber. An armed and dangerous suspect hides from Officers in an apartment complex.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E28 Victoria's New Secret
programme.desc: A woman stuffs drugs into her under garments. A mother attacks her daughter because she got married in Vegas. Officers are called when a woman is accused of stalking her friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E02 Hood Flip
programme.desc: A police chase becomes more dangerous when the hood of a stolen vehicle flips open. A purse snatcher denies robbing a woman. A limping man with a knee injury denies crashing his car into a tree.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E13 Wardrobe Malfunction
programme.desc: A suspect flees police in a truck over a misdemeanor traffic warrant. A man denies hitting his wife who has a bloody nose. A man denies ownership of his shorts when deputies find drugs in them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E22 Four Legs Beats Two Legs
programme.desc: A suspect on a stolen motorcycle is apprehended with the assistance of the K-9 unit. An Officer responds to a domestic disturbance call after a woman "accidentally" stabs her boyfriend. A hazardous meth lab is busted.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E20 Bikinis & Handcuffs
programme.desc: An Officer struggles with a suspect after he appears to reach for a gun. When a car is parked on a desolate road, an officer conducts a routine search and discovers methamphetamine. A woman in a bikini is arrested for driving on a suspended license after an officer pulls her over for a busted tail light.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E30 The Short Pursuit
programme.desc: A repeat offender in Las Vegas attempts an ambitious vertical escape. An officer investigates a domestic call involving an armed male suspect. A driver concealing drugs in his mouth eventually swallows the crack cocaine, but comes clean about his possession.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E16 We Run the Show
programme.desc: A stealthy robbery suspect leads officers on a chase through backyards. After dropping a bag of meth, a man swears he’s only seen the drug on TV. A doped-up domestic violence suspect tries to claim self-defense.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck
programme.desc: Poznaj Toma, wynalazcę z Samochodzikowa! W swoim nowoczesnym laboratorium tworzy wynalazki, aby rozwiązać problemy przyjaciół.

programme.title: Tom's Paint Shop
programme.desc: Zatrzymaj się w warsztacie Toma Holownika! Ten kreatywny malarz z radością ulepszy i nada swoim przyjaciołom nowy, świeży wygląd.

programme.title: AnimaCars Discovery
programme.desc: Poznaj Jonny'ego Toolboxa i AnimaCars i dołącz do ich licznych misji ratunkowych, aby przywrócić spokój w Animatown!

programme.title: Car Patrol
programme.desc: Wszyscy w Samochodzikowie troszczą się o siebie nawzajem. Patrol to specjalny zespół, który dba o bezpieczeństwo mieszkańców.

programme.title: Carl the Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego transformacje na ratunek! Gdy Samochodzikowo potrzebuje pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.title: Construction Squad
programme.desc: Zespół budowlany buduje Samochodzikowo cegła po cegle! Pokazują, że wszystko jest możliwe z pomocą naszych przyjaciół.

programme.title: Monster Town
programme.desc: Poznaj Monster Trucks, ciężko pracujące samochody, które łączą siły, aby pomóc przyjaciołom i mieszkańcom Monster City.

programme.title: RoboFuse
programme.desc: Robo wraz ze swoimi lojalnymi przyjaciółmi chroni Samochodzikowo przed planami Zitrona, chcącego ukraść źródło energii miasta.

programme.title: Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego gadżety na ratunek! Gdy mieszkańcy Car City potrzebują pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.title: 70s Rock Anthems Night!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 70s Rock Anthems Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & guitar action - all night!

programme.title: Carol Decker's 70s Rock Gods!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Carol Decker's 70s Rock Gods!
programme.desc: From Bowie & Black Sabbath to The Police, Thin Lizzy & Status Quo. 25 guitar greats from a classic decade of rock chosen by T'Pau's Carol Decker.

programme.title: 70s Rock Anthems Night!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 70s Rock Anthems Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & guitar action - all night!

programme.title: Meat Loaf 1975-1995
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Meat Loaf 1975-1995
programme.desc: The much missed legend with 45 minutes of his monster rock operas from the 70s to the 90s.

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1975
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1975
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1975 - a year of rock including The Quo, Bowie & Queen. But also included Kojak rapping! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1976
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1976
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1976 - including 3 huge chart toppers from Abba! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1977
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1977
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1977 - a year when David Soul & disco were kings! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: Pat Sharp's Forgotten No.1s
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Pat Sharp's Forgotten No.1s
programme.desc: Pat Man selects 30 chart toppers of the 70s that have probably slipped your mind! Expect lesser remembered hits from Mud, Dr Hook, David Cassidy, Lena Martell & Brotherhood of Man.

programme.title: All Day - They Hit The Top Spot!

programme.title: American No.1s of 1974
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 American No.1s of 1974

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Unwind Park Hyatt, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya Passfield seeks local Maldivian experiences in Hadahaa, where she learns about the ecosystem, local traditions and cuisine.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Bucket List Kagoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty visit Meiji-Gura in Kyushu, Japan, to taste a locally brewed Japanese hard liquor, Shochu. They also go to the Makurazaki region for a special meal of bonito, a Japanese seafood delicacy, prepared for them by world-class chefs, Gaggan Anand and Takeshi “Goh” Fukuyama.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Hanoi, Vietnam
programme.desc: In Hanoi, Rohan relishes local delicacies like Pho and Bun Cha. After this, he visits historic sights, rides a Cyclo and enjoys a water puppet show.

programme.title: City Break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 City Break Bengaluru India
programme.desc: Take a break from your mundane routine and set out to discover what different cities have to offer with City Breaks.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E46 Xp Guide Prague, Czech Republic
programme.desc: Catch the beauty of Prague through its fascinating history, its classic mix of Gothic and Renaissance architecture and more.

programme.title: Bliss
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bliss Santorini, Greece
programme.desc: Most popular destinations of Santorini's main island are the volcano and the hot spring.This is best way to explore this island is on foot.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E39 Best From The Rest Taiwan
programme.desc: From the Rainbow village to the Sun Moon Lake, Taiwan offers different experiences that exude the beauty and spirit of the country.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E54 Bucket List Fukuoka, Japan
programme.desc: While the rest of Japan remained isolated from the world, Fukuoka’s global flavour was concocted by centuries of trade with its Asian neighbours. Adventurers, Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty attend a unique baseball game at a rather offbeat stadium in Kyushu’s largest city.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Off The Grid Wild Atlantic Way 1, Ireland
programme.desc: Starting his journey of Wild Atlantic Way, Alex stops at Cliffs of Moher. He further visits Ashford Castle, ending as he cycles 60 kms to Mulranny.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 City Breaks Sofia, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria's capital Sofia is one of Europe's most compact and walkable city, with small gardens, parks and cafes sprawled all over.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 10 Days Cyprus Larnaka (ENG)
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Costa Rica Calling Cartago
programme.desc: Genevieve visits the charming town of Zarcero, where she chances upon the prized cheese of Costa Rica.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Itoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Why do men camp in the great outdoors? Simply to get some peace and quiet. In this episode, watch Dan & Paddy’s day in Itoshima - a place with soothing waterfalls, fishing pools and perfect beach sunsets to calm the soul.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Off The Grid Wild Atlantic Way 2, Ireland
programme.desc: Alex explores Keem beach, visits Dooagh village and 6000 year old Ceide Fields. Next day, after breakfast, he explores Donegal.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: One of Uzbekistan’s most ancient cities, Bukhara was a popular town even during the days of the Silk Route trading. Built atop a constellation of small oases here weary desert travelers could find water and rest. Through its madrassahs, minarets, a massive royal fortress and the remnants of a once-vast market complex, Alex Outhwaite soaks in the vibes of the Central Asia of yore.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 10 Days Cyprus Nicosia
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Costa Rica Calling, Turrialba
programme.desc: In the Turrialba region, Genevieve finds herself in awe of the highest volcano in Costa Rica, its active presence quickening her pulse.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Gyokuro, Japan
programme.desc: Tea in Japan is a spiritual concept. Attaching ritual and ceremony to it, this country transforms the act of drinking tea to a moment of communion with the universe. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out different ways to relish Gyokuro tea, one of the highest grades of tea available in Japan. They also visit the village where it is grown.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 World Heritage Monuments of Cairo and Luxor, Egypt
programme.desc: While the Pyramids of Giza, built as a royal mortuary, reveal the religious beliefs of Egyptian pharaohs, temples, like the Luxor temple, offer a glimpse of ancient Egyptian mythology. The Saladin Citadel, which defines the skyline of Cairo, however, tells stories of the faith of Ottoman rulers. The monuments of Egypt are a testament to the different beliefs that have shaped this country.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Bucket List Kagoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty visit Meiji-Gura in Kyushu, Japan, to taste a locally brewed Japanese hard liquor, Shochu. They also go to the Makurazaki region for a special meal of bonito, a Japanese seafood delicacy, prepared for them by world-class chefs, Gaggan Anand and Takeshi “Goh” Fukuyama.

programme.title: Bliss
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bliss Santorini, Greece

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E39 Best From The Rest Taiwan
programme.desc: From the Rainbow village to the Sun Moon Lake, Taiwan offers different experiences that exude the beauty and spirit of the country.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Hanoi, Vietnam
programme.desc: In Hanoi, Rohan relishes local delicacies like Pho and Bun Cha. After this, he visits historic sights, rides a Cyclo and enjoys a water puppet show.

programme.title: City Break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 City Break Bengaluru India
programme.desc: Take a break from your mundane routine and set out to discover what different cities have to offer with City Breaks.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 10 Days Cyprus Larnaka (ENG)
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E54 Bucket List Fukuoka, Japan

programme.desc: Genevieve visits the charming town of Zarcero, where she chances upon the prized cheese of Costa Rica.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Off The Grid Wild Atlantic Way 1, Ireland

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 City Breaks Sofia, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria's capital Sofia is one of Europe's most compact and walkable city, with small gardens, parks and cafes sprawled all over.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 10 Days Cyprus Nicosia
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Itoshima, Japan

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: One of Uzbekistan’s most ancient cities, Bukhara was a popular town even during the days of the Silk Route trading. Built atop a constellation of small oases here weary desert travelers could find water and rest. Through its madrassahs, minarets, a massive royal fortress and the remnants of a once-vast market complex, Alex Outhwaite soaks in the vibes of the Central Asia of yore.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Bucket List Sakurajima, Japan
programme.desc: The name Sakurajima means cherry blossom island - and that is the beguiling name of a fuming volcano in Kyushu. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try different ways to get up, close and personal with the volcano. What they don’t count on is an eruption.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 World Spas Mines Wellness, Thailand (ENG)
programme.desc: Shirodhara is a traditional Ayurvedic oil drip treatment that popular world traveler, Jamie Srubis tries at the Mines Wellness Resort in Malaysia. Following this, she tries other treatments such as Urut Melayu, a full body massage which derives its technique from a traditional Malay martial art, and Acupuncture and Moxibustion, the two oldest treatments of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

programme.desc: Guided by an irresistible call to adventure, young American traveler, Genevieve Sexton ventures deep into Costa Rica.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Off The Grid Londonderry, Ireland
programme.desc: Alex visits Peace bridge and explores Ness County by visiting Mussenden temple. Later tries blow-karting.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Cyprus Akamas (ENG)
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bucket List Qura, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty pay a visit to the award-winning swordsmith, Matsunaga Genrokuro in the city of Arao in Kyushu, Japan. He shows them a few things about making the swords used by the Samurai, and how to wield them. They also explore some hidden Christian sites in the Nagasaki region.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Unwind The Palace, Dubai
programme.desc: Sabrina explores Palace hotel with trying local delicacies,visits Dubai Mall and Dubai Fountain.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 World Heritage Monuments of Cairo and Luxor, Egypt
programme.desc: While the Pyramids of Giza, built as a royal mortuary, reveal the religious beliefs of Egyptian pharaohs, temples, like the Luxor temple, offer a glimpse of ancient Egyptian mythology. The Saladin Citadel, which defines the skyline of Cairo, however, tells stories of the faith of Ottoman rulers. The monuments of Egypt are a testament to the different beliefs that have shaped this country.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Ahmedabad (ENG)
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E55 Xp Guide Jerusalem, Israel
programme.desc: Travel enthusiast, Aradhana Jagota experiences the spiritual magnetism of Jerusalem, a holy city for Muslims, Christians and Jews.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Bucket List Sakurajima, Japan
programme.desc: The name Sakurajima means cherry blossom island - and that is the beguiling name of a fuming volcano in Kyushu. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try different ways to get up, close and personal with the volcano. What they don’t count on is an eruption.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Unwind Park Hyatt, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya Passfield seeks local Maldivian experiences in Hadahaa, where she learns about the ecosystem, local traditions and cuisine.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 World Spas Mines Wellness, Thailand (ENG)
programme.desc: Shirodhara is a traditional Ayurvedic oil drip treatment that popular world traveler, Jamie Srubis tries at the Mines Wellness Resort in Malaysia. Following this, she tries other treatments such as Urut Melayu, a full body massage which derives its technique from a traditional Malay martial art, and Acupuncture and Moxibustion, the two oldest treatments of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E46 Xp Guide Prague, Czech Republic
programme.desc: Catch the beauty of Prague through its fascinating history, its classic mix of Gothic and Renaissance architecture and more.

programme.desc: Take a break from your mundane routine and set out to discover what different cities have to offer with City Breaks.

programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty visit Meiji-Gura in Kyushu, Japan, to taste a locally brewed Japanese hard liquor, Shochu. They also go to the Makurazaki region for a special meal of bonito, a Japanese seafood delicacy, prepared for them by world-class chefs, Gaggan Anand and Takeshi “Goh” Fukuyama.

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop _4 - Fieberbrunn P

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.title: WHY WE FLY
programme.desc: Ever wondered what goes through someone’s mind as they jump from a helicopter above the Canadian Rockies? Then ride along with the Team KAVU athletes as they wingsuit, skydive, and speedride above scenic Fernie, British Columbia.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn Challenger – Zell am See-Kaprun - Live delayed Part 3

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno
programme.desc: Cape Verde is hosting the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the best kitesurfers in the world like Elena Moreno. From breathtaking freestyle tricks to impressive racing moments, her determination and talent are on display.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 1
programme.desc: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 1

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - 52min Highlight Show
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is a motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. With world-class drivers and riders, participants tackle challenging dunes and rugged terrain.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E11 Stage 11 - SCL Poland 2023
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E12 Stage 12 - SCL Poland 2023
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E13 Stage 13 - SCL Cyprus 2023
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.desc: The Strongman Champions League kicks off its 2014 season in Martinique.

programme.desc: The second stage of 2014 Strongman champions League, in Cologne, Germany. 14 athletes from 12 different countries battled through six events on the second stop

programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 7, Portugal

programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 9, Poland
programme.desc: SCL returns to Poland with 12 athletes all battling for the number one title

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 10, Hungary
programme.desc: The 10th stage takes place in Hungary and features new super talent!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 11, Zambia
programme.desc: The first ever SCL in Zambia! The athletes get to take in some of the stunning sights and go on to do events such as Tyre Flip and Log Lift

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 12, Romania
programme.desc: The competition moves to Romania and for the first time this season the athletes compete in rainy conditions which make the events even tougher

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 13, Lithunia
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition takes place in Lithunia and world records are once again broken!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia
programme.desc: Episode 14 takes place in Estonia where drama and world records will be seen again

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E02 GLORY 99: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: The year-long, five-event tournament kicks off at GLORY 99 in Rotterdam Ahoy, featuring 32 heavyweights in 16 bouts on a mega all-heavyweight card.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E11 GLORY 90
programme.desc: Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) will put his GLORY welterweight title on the line against ‘House of GLORY’ winner Anwar Ouled-Chaib (3-0) in the main event. In the co-main event, local fan favourite Nabil Khachab (26-4-1, 4 KO) finally gets his opportunity to enter the GLORY Grand Prix as he goes up against Serbia’s Nikola Filipovic (11-2, 6 KO) in a qualifying fight. Number one ranked Enriko Kehl (52-15-2, 30 KO) will be aiming undeniably book his spot as the next title challenger against champion Tyjani Beztati. The German meets the dangerous Arman Hambaryan (58-8-2, 27 KO) of Armenia.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: 3 wins to come out on top, who's it going to be? Rico Verhoeven, Levi Rigters, Tarik Osaro, Benjamin Adegbuyi, Sofian Laidouni, Uku Jurjendal, Bahram Rajabzadeh, and Nabil Khachab pair up and throw down for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix, an 8-man 1-night heavyweight tournament for the ages.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E02 GLORY 91 Paris
programme.desc: The GLORY welterweight title will be on the line in the main event as the reigning & defending champion Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) welcomes the challenge of top contender Chico Kwasi (42-5, 22 KO). In the co-main event, after his crazy GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix performance, the wild & exciting Bahram Rajabzadeh (66-2, 58 KO) steps down to light heavyweight and meets the hard-hitting Paris-based Kevin Oumar (33-4, 7 KO), a French kickboxing champion & budding MMA star. Belgian-Moroccan superstar Youssef Boughanem (187-43-8, 119 KO) steps into the GLORY ring for the very first time in his illustrious career as he meets the Ukraine’s Stanislav Kazantsev (25-8-1, 7 KO). The best of French...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E11 GLORY 90
programme.desc: Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) will put his GLORY welterweight title on the line against ‘House of GLORY’ winner Anwar Ouled-Chaib (3-0) in the main event. In the co-main event, local fan favourite Nabil Khachab (26-4-1, 4 KO) finally gets his opportunity to enter the GLORY Grand Prix as he goes up against Serbia’s Nikola Filipovic (11-2, 6 KO) in a qualifying fight. Number one ranked Enriko Kehl (52-15-2, 30 KO) will be aiming undeniably book his spot as the next title challenger against champion Tyjani Beztati. The German meets the dangerous Arman Hambaryan (58-8-2, 27 KO) of Armenia.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: 3 wins to come out on top, who's it going to be? Rico Verhoeven, Levi Rigters, Tarik Osaro, Benjamin Adegbuyi, Sofian Laidouni, Uku Jurjendal, Bahram Rajabzadeh, and Nabil Khachab pair up and throw down for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix, an 8-man 1-night heavyweight tournament for the ages.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 92 Rotterdam
programme.desc: Donovan Wisse (20-1, 10 KO) puts his middleweight championship on the line against number one contender Ulric Bokeme (32-4, 17 KO) in the main event of the evening. Wisse is one of the top P4P kickboxers on the planet today and is chasing his fourth straight title defense. After his Grand Prix heroics, the number one ranked heavyweight Levi Rigters (17-2, 8 KO) returns to action to take on dangerous late notice replacement Nico Pereira Horta (22-8, 3 KO) in the co-main event. The ‘King of The Hague’ crown is up for grabs when rivals Michael Boapeah (16-4-1, 7 KO) and Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-9, 36 KO) clash. The two top middleweights meet in this local derby match-up where the winner walks...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: The eight-man one-night GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix will crown the baddest light heavyweight striker on the planet. The eight participants are: GLORY champion, #C Tarik Khbabez (58-10-1, 28 KO), Morocco. Former champion, #1 Donegi Abena (27-10, 7 KO), Suriname. Former champion, #2 Sergej Maslobojev (38-6, 23 KO), Lithuania. Undefeated in GLORY, #3 Stefan Latescu (17-2, 8 KO), Romania. ‘Mister Cool’ #4 Ibrahim El Bouni (41-9-1, 22 KO), Morocco. The wild & unpredictable, #5 Bahram Rajabzadeh (67-2, 59 KO), Azerbaijan. Top French light heavyweight, #6 Pascal Toure (20-6, 7 KO), France. Veteran fighter, #7 Bogdan Stoica (58-14, 40 KO), Romania.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.sub-title: S02 : E74 Mehek S2 E74
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Aligarh
programme.desc: Set in the state of Uttar Pradesh and based on true events, the plot revolves around Dr Shrinivas Ramchandra Siras who taught Marathi at Aligarh Muslim University. He was sacked from his position of Reader and Chair of Modern Indian Languages, on charges of homosexuality. A sting operation conducted by a TV channel showed him in a compromising position with a rickshaw puller inside the campus.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Jodha Akbar S2 E15
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.desc: A rich playboy Jin Wook starts work in his father's resort as a bellhop. He keeps encounter Yoo Mi.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 My Secret Romance
programme.desc: After spending a night with Jin Wook, Yoo Mi run away from him. 3 years later, she becomes a nutritionist.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi struggles to meet the unreasonable demands of her boss.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi brings a meal to Jin Wook’s office and she encounters him with Hye Ri. Hye Ri is jealous of Yoo Mi.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi takes Dong Goo to Jin Wook’s house and Dong Goo accidentally breaks an expensive jewelry box.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Jin Wook makes Yoo Mi work overtime to prevent Yoo Mi from spending time together with Hyeon Tae.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi agrees to pay for the jewelry box and medical fees by having dinner with Jin Wook ten times.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi goes to Jin Wook’s house to cook a meal and just about to sit down to eat, Jin Wook’s father drops by.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi and Jin Wook stay at one of the company’s resorts. Meanwhile, in Seoul, Hye Ri visits Hyeon Tae.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 My Secret Romance
programme.desc: When Dae Bok sees Jin Wook playing with Dong Goo, he thinks that Yoo Mi and Jin Wook had a child.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Hye Ri harasses Yoo Mi. Meanwhile, Dae Bok visits Yoo Mi’s home to find out if Dong Goo is his grandchild.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 My Secret Romance
programme.desc: After she quits her job, Yoo Mi moves to Daejeon to work at a university. Hyeon Tae comes to visit her.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi blames her mom for her misfortune and goes to the beach where she first met Jin Wook.
